name: Dheena Chandra Dhas
description: '''Dheena Chandra Dhas''' (born in [[Madras]], India, on 1 August 1956) is an actor, singer, [[voice over artist]] and [[sound engineer]]. He is the younger brother of the well-known 70s musician [[Madhukar C. Dhas]].{{Citation needed|date=October 2025}} He lives in [[Kodaikanal]], [[Tamil Nadu]], India.
